favourite.article: Learnt this at Ikoyi Baptist Church in Lagos Nigeria about 35 years ago. Going to teach it to my children's Sunday school class this Sunday D.V.
Never heard it before, what a wonderful song for all children of GOD. Alleluja. I'm happy! Amen!
Even though I am 66 yrs of age I sing this song knowing I am a Child of God. Praise God. Thank You Jesus, King of Kings.
This song reminds me of childhood. We sang it during morning assembly at Auntie Margaret School, Calabar. I love this song!

"Praise Him, Praise Him, All Ye Little Children" is a song from my childhood that went straight to my heart and stayed there. Praise Him, love Him, thank Him are as good admonitions to me today as they were then--and I wholeheartedly respond to the God Who is Love now as then!
"Serve Him" is another verse I remember.
This scripture comes so readily to mind:
Matthew 18:1-5 (KJV) 1 At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus, saying, Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven? 2 And Jesus called a little child unto him, and set him in the midst of them, 3 And said, Verily I say unto you, Except ye be converted, and become as little children, ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven. 4 Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child, the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven. 5 And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me. God bless these words to our hearts!
God sent Jesus because He loves us, and Jesus died for us because He loves us. Jesus came for love and died for love. Hallelujah!!! for our Lord Jesus Christ is king above all and He reigns on high.

This hymn clearly reminds me of my early years in Univeristy of Ilorin primary school when we sing this hymn at our assembly. True Love comes from GOD and GOD IS LOVE. Praise Him, praise Him Hallelujah!!!!
Praise Him! Love Him! Thank Him! Hallelujah! I am very happy!!! Christ is Victor.
Hallelujah we are children of God we have His divine life and we can call Him our Father dear amen!

Thank you Lord, you have chosen me to be Your child and Your son!!
With this, Lord I want to grow in love and life on You!!
